title: [Ta'Illistim, Dragon Fountain]
description: Tiled in small, pale blue glaes squares, the interior of the fountain is just deep enough for one to submerge completely beneath the water.  A spray of water jets from the dragon's mouth, cascading down his scaly hide to land musically upon the surface of the pool.  The cool water laps gently at the sides of the fountain, glimmering in the sunlight.
